name: Jumppy
description:
Jumppy is a platformer... just a platformer... but if you touch the gray, you will die (and...well... if you die, you lose...)

There's 9 levels and some cool stuff... ig... But I don't know if it's really nice

Jumppy now is just a build, it's not the final product !

Thank you to try Jumppy

I made it during only december. I made all by myself and it was really hard and a lot of things made the things to make harder. (Made with Godot Engine)

PS: if you have any troubles/feedback/bug, please send me an email mach.help@gmail.com
